description:
Returning to work after New Year`s Shiori thinks she`s gotten taller and she asks Shinozaki if he notices anything different about her. Later, Yutaka swipes her brother`s phone and sends a message to Shiori asking for a picture.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vous êtes sûr de ne pas en vouloir ?
You Sure You Don`t Want One?
本当にいらないんですか?
